title: Thinking of upgrading your gaming laptop? These RTX 4050 deals start at  ₹79,990

title: Over 2,000 GCCs signal India’s rising clout in AI and technology services: Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw
snippet: Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw says India’s IT sector is shifting to an AI-led services model, backed by data centres, global capability centres and updated curricula, as government, industry and academia work together to position the country as a global hub for AI solutions.

title: OpenAI reportedly planning AI earbuds ahead of more advanced device
snippet: A new leak suggests OpenAI’s first consumer hardware could be AI-powered earbuds, codenamed Dime, offering voice-based assistance and hands-free access to its models. A simpler version may launch first, with advanced devices delayed due to component shortages.

title: 2-nanometre Qualcomm chip unveiled; Ashwini Vaishnaw sets Semicon 2.0 roadmap
snippet: Union Minister for Electronics and IT Ashwini Vaishnaw on Saturday unveiled high-tech 2-nanometer chip manufactured by Qualcomm. On the occasion, the minister underscored the country's rapid progress in building an end-to-end semiconductor ecosystem.

title: No AI used: Rockstar says GTA 6 will be ‘handcrafted’, built ‘street by street’
snippet: Rockstar Games has confirmed that generative AI will not be used in GTA VI. Take Two interactive CEO confirmed the development in a recent interview where he emphasized that the game will be handcrafted.&nbsp;

title: Andhra to set up AI Living Labs Foundation; HQ in Amaravati
snippet: The AI Living Labs Foundation will provide shared graphics processing unit (GPU) computing resources, AI tools, curated datasets and sandboxes for workforce skilling, aligned with the state's objective of inclusive digital growth and its vision of enabling 'one AI-trained individual per family'.
